Is this repeatable?  When did it start happening?

Yes, I get this every time.
The follwoing two screenshots show the perspective layouts before switching and after the error has 
occured.

I'm unable to re-create this on Build id: N20050502-0010 on WinXP.  I'm going
back to I20050426.  Andre, I wonder if you could confirm this on a more recent
build?

This is probably a Mac only problem.
It does not only happen when switching workspaces but on exiting Eclipse too.
I can reliably reproduce it in N20050503

Exception no longer occurs in N20050507, but it does in I20050506.

Although the layout was triggered in the perspective switcher, it is possible
that the GDE was in another toolbar ToolBar with a similar widget hierarchy. On
friday I fixed a potental GDE while optimizing the fast view bar (which also
contains a ToolBar inside a CellLayout). I believe this is what you are seeing
here. It should be fixed now.
